<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\file This file describes the interface of the Localizer pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass moves/duplicates constant-like instructions close to their uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Its primarily goal is to workaround the deficiencies of the fast register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// allocator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// With GlobalISel constants are all materialized in the entry block of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a function. However, the fast allocator cannot rematerialize constants and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// has a lot more live-ranges to deal with and will most likely end up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// spilling a lot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// By pushing the constants close to their use, we only create small</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// live-ranges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;GLOBALISEL&#95;LOCALIZER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;GLOBALISEL&#95;LOCALIZER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/setvector-h">llvm/ADT/SetVector.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunctionpass-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineFunctionPass.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass implements the localization mechanism described at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// top of this file. One specificity of the implementation is that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it will materialize one and only one instance of a constant per</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// basic block, thus enabling reuse of that constant within that block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Moreover, it only materializes constants in blocks where they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are used. PHI uses are considered happening at the end of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// related predecessor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/localizer"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/localizer/#a62ba443c3e6872953f937aaca117c8ba">Localizer</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass/#a29c81d2386f4a727c6d33413807530c8">MachineFunctionPass</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
